projects.title: E-commerce Platform
projects.description: A full-stack e-commerce platform built with Next.js, Prisma, and Stripe integration.
projects.shortDescription: Modern e-commerce solution with payment integration
features: Product catalog with search and filtering
challenges: Optimizing database queries for large product catalogs
Creating responsive design across all device sizes
Managing complex state for shopping cart functionality
learnings: Advanced Next.js features like SSR and ISR
projects.overview: This e-commerce platform represents a comprehensive solution for online retail businesses. Built with modern web technologies, it provides a seamless shopping experience for customers while offering powerful management tools for administrators. The platform handles everything from product browsing to payment processing, with a focus on performance, security, and user experience.

projects.title: Task Management App
projects.description: A real-time task management application with team collaboration features.
projects.shortDescription: Collaborative project management with real-time updates
challenges: Implementing real-time synchronization across multiple users
Managing complex state with real-time updates
learnings: Advanced React patterns for complex state management
projects.overview: A comprehensive task management solution designed for modern teams. This application combines the power of real-time collaboration with intuitive project management features. Teams can organize their work, track progress, and communicate effectively, all within a single platform that updates instantly across all connected devices.

projects.title: AI Chat Interface
projects.description: An AI-powered chat interface with natural language processing capabilities.
projects.shortDescription: Intelligent chatbot with advanced NLP features
challenges: Handling large file uploads and processing
projects.overview: An advanced AI chat interface that leverages cutting-edge natural language processing to provide intelligent, context-aware conversations. This application demonstrates the integration of modern AI technologies with web development, creating a seamless user experience that can understand, analyze, and respond to complex queries with remarkable accuracy.
